title: Semester-Long TryHackMe CTF Series
description: A 14-week challenge series releasing three TryHackMe labs weekly, covering OSINT, forensics, RE, malware, cryptography, networking, and web security. Open all semester with technical support.

title: Game Off 2025 Collaboration
description: Weekly Wednesday sessions with Cyber Security, Computer Science, and Data Science societies to plan and develop entries for the Itch.io Game Off 2025. Team formation, ideation, and gameplay development.

title: Bi-Weekly Online Meets
location: Discord, every other Thursday, 5 pm - 8 pm
description: Community sessions for games, event planning, project ideas, open discussion, and social bonding. Held every two weeks.

title: Cyber Security Awareness Event
description: Talks on the impact of cybercrime, cybersecurity career paths, phishing challenges, Google phishing game, in-person attacker/legitimate sender simulation, Kahoot quiz, and pizza.

title: Big Welcome 2025 Stall
location: BCU Big Welcome Fair, City Centre Campus
description: The society's launch event at the Big Welcome fair, resulting in a 760% membership increase (5 to 40+). Included demos, Q&A, and helping freshers across multiple tech degrees.
